resources.string:
Hangman is a game in which you try to save the stickman from being hanged. You have to guess the word shown on screen as a certain amount of stars * where each star represents a letter in the word. After failing six times the stickman is hanged and you lose the game. Your only chance to win the game is by completing the word in six tries or less and therefore saving the poor guy from hanging. 

 This project was created as a part of the Course 62550 User experience and mobile application development E17 at DTU.
